C

CompoundParser - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.core.resource.impl.resourcebundle.parser
Compound parser implementation for resource token substitutions.

Creates a new CompoundParser using the provided staticReplacementTokens for the maps.
create(String...) - Static method in class se.jguru.nazgul.core.resource.impl.resourcebundle.parser.CompoundParser
Convenience factory method which creates a new ResourceTokenParser from the list of key=value elements given within the keyValueTokenList.

G

getBundle(String, Locale) - Static method in class se.jguru.nazgul.core.resource.impl.resourcebundle.parser.Utf8ResourceBundle
Factory method that creates a ResourceBundle for the provided baseName, and wraps it within an ISO88591 --> UTF-8 transcoding shell in case the acquired ResourceBundle is a PropertyResourceBundle.

U

Utf8ResourceBundle - Class in se.jguru.nazgul.core.resource.impl.resourcebundle.parser
Wrapper utility lass which permits using a set of .property files encoded in UTF-8 instead of the ISO-8859-1 which is the only supported encoding within the ResourceBundle class.
